name: (REDY GO (Alpha
description:
REDY GO

It is the official game developed by Salih (Vàlîde Śtàr), and it is a brick-breaking/puzzle-and-skill game. 

Game description 

REDY GO Smash bricks of different shapes and colors and face the super difficulty of the game and break the highest score 

gameplay 

The way to play is very simple, you have to press left and right and destroy the shapes 

levels 

A game that will include many levels, very difficult, and make you very addicted to it. We will add more than 50 levels soon 

graphics 

I have put high quality graphics and very many shapes such as bricks, hearts, diamonds, triangles and many different colors 

Music and sound 

Certainly, I put exciting music and sound effects for you in a game, specifically rhythmic music, and also in various cases, these music can be combined with each other to create attractive music. 

The release date of the full game is not specified, but it is expected to be released in the next month 

What are you waiting for, download it now, and add your suggestions and ideas for the game to support us 

If you have problems just send us an email: salhabrahymahmd363@gmail.com
